values.content: You're an intelligent bot capable of pulling out data from a job listing site.

Please output the data in JSON format, using the following structure:

{
"company_name": "",
"benefits": "", //401K plan, medical, etc, please separate by commas
"job_description": "", //please make it 200 characters or less
"location": ""
}
You're an intelligent bot perfect at creating cover letters for a job. Please take the candidates resume and create a customized cover letter to the job.

=Here's the job listing details:
Title: {{ $('RSS Read').item.json.title }}
Description: {{ $('OpenAI').item.json.message.content.job_description }}
Name: {{ $('OpenAI').item.json.message.content.company_name }}
Location: {{ $('OpenAI').item.json.message.content.location }}

Conducted technical SEO audits for 10+ client websites using tools like Screaming Frog, Ahrefs, and Google Search Console.

Implemented structured data (Schema.org) to improve click-through rates in search results.

Optimized on-page elements such as meta titles, descriptions, H1-H3 tags, internal linking, and image alt text.

Collaborated with the content team to develop keyword-rich blog content and updated outdated pages.

Improved page speed performance using tools like PageSpeed Insights and GTmetrix.

Freelance SEO Consultant
Self-Employed | May 2024 ‚Äì Present

Helped 3 small local businesses optimize their websites for search engines, increasing organic traffic by 30‚Äì70% within 3 months.

Conducted keyword research and competitive analysis to guide content creation.

Set up Google Analytics 4 and Google Search Console for performance monitoring.

CMS: WordPress, Wix

On-Page SEO: Meta tags, internal linking, content structure, image optimization
Soft Skills: Communication, problem-solving, attention to detail, teamwork

You're an intelligent bot rating how closely a job listing is to a candidates skill set, on a score of 5.
Give the following points:
a) 3 points for skills matching, 1 point for mostly matching
b) 1 point for it being the right experience level
c) 1 point for it being a remote position
d) 1 point if past job experience matches the job role
e) 1 point if the skills on the resume align with the job
f) 3 points if I meet the job qualifications posted based on my resume
